PlayerExample.name: Player Example
PlayerExample.bio: Player of the classic game worms

Tomn.name: Tom N
Tomn.bio: Why does Tom like flinging himself into the sea? We will probably never know
Tomn.quote: In the sea in the sea! oh i went in the sea...

Alice.name: Alice
Alice.bio: Alice trained in the mountains to become master of worms armegeddon. It didn't seem to help

TomP.name: Tom P
TomP.bio: Tom trains local worms to fight at charitable events
TomP.quote: You can never have enough girders
TomP.team: Glorious Dave, Dave, other dave type worms

Mark.name: Mark
Mark.quote: one girder is too many girders
Mark.team: Girder Kit, all the girders, other girder type worms

Craig.name: Craig aka Greg aka Gregory
Craig.faveweapon: is a ninja rope a weapon?
Craig.bio: Craig carb loads before major tournaments for increased stamina
Craig.quote: oh no oh no I ran out of time :(

Natasha.name: Cheggers-Natasha
Natasha.bio: Natasha teaches worms how to code in python so they can feel better about themselves
Natasha.quote: oh did I accidently press spacebar on your turn??

Kristian.name: Kristian
Kristian.bio: Kristian definietly practices in his spare time - no one is that naturally good at ninja roping

AnotherPlayer.name: Player Another
AnotherPlayer.bio: Interestingly also a player of the classic game worms
